title: [MEDIUM] Signal Ecosystem Enhancement
body:
## Vision Gap

VISION describes a full signal ecosystem - current implementation is basic.

## Required Features

### Signal Aggregation
- Multiple signal sources (Telegram, Discord, APIs)
- Signal parsing and standardization
- Duplicate detection

### Performance Tracking
- Track each signal source's win rate
- Calculate risk-adjusted returns
- Auto-rank signal providers

### Copy Trading
- Follow top performers
- Configurable copy ratios
- Risk limits per signal source
- Blacklist underperformers

### Signal Generation
- K.I.T. generates own signals
- Based on AI analysis
- Shareable with other users

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Aggregates signals from multiple sources
- [ ] Tracks signal performance
- [ ] Auto-copies profitable signals
- [ ] Generates own signals

## Priority: MEDIUM
